thread.section_title: Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect weekend!
thread.title_full: Perfect weekend! - Review of Hotel Cervantes by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alex S
title: Perfect weekend!
text: Great hotel! very friendly accommodating staff that reserved a last minute table for us at Monsieur Blue (restaurant with amazing views of the Eiffel Tower). The location is not too touristy but is also close enough to the centre of Paris. Rome Metro station is only a 5 minute walk away. Supermarkets and restaurants all within walking distance. The room was very clean and and ideal for us and there was free cocktails every night from 6pm-8pm!
